name: The Mnemonist
notes: Quonxy's father. Founded Alton mnemonic culture with partner.

name: Quonxy
notes: Uses tapestries and puzzles for addiction counseling. Invented CSQ notation.

name: Little Porn
notes: Child prodigy. Created 104 words for 100-piece puzzles. Sells languages.

name: Vivian Hammond
notes: Uses puzzles to teach. Leaves missing pieces deliberately.

name: Jacob Hammond
notes: Made puzzles with admixtures of fonts and ciphers. Puzzles wouldn't come apart.

name: Josh
notes: Pastor. CrossPatchPastorJosh. Runs River-of-Life Church.

name: Simon
notes: 'Puzzle kid.' First to work out puzzle language under Quonxy.

name: Roger Deavers
notes: Missionary linguist. Failed to translate Ukbitu. Little Porn's father.

name: Crank
notes: Hobbyist linguist. Software worker. Wanted to be missionary.

name: Collective_Alpha
notes: One of five mnemonic teaching collectives scattered across US.

name: Collective_Beta
notes: One of five mnemonic teaching collectives scattered across US.

name: Collective_Gamma
notes: One of five mnemonic teaching collectives scattered across US.

name: Collective_Delta
notes: One of five mnemonic teaching collectives scattered across US.

name: Collective_Epsilon
notes: One of five mnemonic teaching collectives scattered across US.

name: Nelson Hammond
notes: Vivian's father. Bird watcher who whittled walking sticks.

name: Bill
notes: Drinks too much. Weekly sessions with Quonxy.

name: Pastor Hitch
notes: Pastor with sports betting addiction.

name: Gregory
notes: Seven-year-old. Got all A's after one quarter with Vivian.

name: Bruce Stephenson
notes: Thirty-something losing ability to speak. Vivian uses puzzles.

name: Cassie
notes: Tenth-grader. Named the ice-fishing man Paul.
